column5: Wanna go do some Camping and don't want to pay the $35 it now costs to camp per day!  I know there are a lot of Islands in the Muskoka's you can portage too. Not sure if I am interested in that. I have too much camping stuff....  If I recall, moon river off hwy 11 is also good, but cant recall the accessibility. Any other spots?  I'll travel up to 2 1/2 hours from Toronto.
CROWN LAND Your entitled to a 21 day stay free
When I think of crown land. I think of 3+ hours or more up north! I know this question has been asked but where do I find a map with crown land illustrated on it?With access points.
Johnny Bass here is the link to the crown land atlas http://crownlanduseatlas.mnr.gov.on.ca/ Go Home has some nice boat in camp sites
there is a campground in mattawa that is free.
If I post sites will be full    when you get there-check your pm.
